column1: Art Institute of Chicago////This building is huge and beautiful. At first I didn't really care about going but once inside
column2: I was impressed by all the amazing art pieces. From Asian to African
column4: it's always astonishing to see sculptures and art from hundreds of years ago. To see so much of it in pristine condition is mind boggling. I was able to go during the Impressionism
column6: and Modernity exhibition. Some of the paintings were so real that they looked like actual photographs. They also had on display similar dresses that were worn in the portraits. I'm no art buff by any means and not even an art enthusiast
column7: but I still recognized some of the paintings that were on display at the museum. Like I said
column8: I didn't care about going but once inside
column9: I was definitely able to appreciate all the different exhibits.
